roleset.name: be or come into contact with, literally or metpahorically
roleset.note: TOUCH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'touch' based on sentences in financial subcorpus; nominal 'touching' based on BOLT-7. Comparison with hit and start. VN updated by Julia. Member of Vncls amuse-31.1, contiguous_location-47.8-1, relate-86.2-1, touch-20-1. (from touch.01-v)
TOUCH-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on touch-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls contiguous_location-47.8-1, relate-86.2-1, touch-20-1. (from touch.01-n)
TOUCHING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from touching.01-n)

roles.note: Note that the instrument should ONLY be used when there is also anagent stated in the sentence--otherwise it gets too difficult todistinguish agent and instrument. (from touch.01-v) Arg2, instrument, not included. If you see an instrument that occurs in addition to an agent, use MNR. (from touch.01-n)

role.descr: touched with, if separate from agent

example.name: whack
example.text: Mary touched John lightly with a sledgehammer.

example.name: emotional touch
example.text: [John]-1 was deeply touched *trace*-1 by Mary's kind gesture.

example.name: be in contact
example.text: John's eyebrows touch in the center of his forehead.
example.arg: in the center of his forehead

example.name: nominal rel: touching
example.text: Maybe China hope to train hundreds of millions of corrupt officials to defeat the United States and recover the South China Sea successively , and if so , it is unilateral willingness just like such self touching as watching mental masturbation and meanwhile touching cock !
example.arg: [such][as watching mental masturbation and meanwhile touching cock]

example.name: both args
example.text: Her touch of the Lord heals her.

example.name: just arg1
example.text: With the touch of a button , drivers can choose from lavender , jasmine , mint or perfume scents ...

example.name: both args
example.text: By the touch of His hand on mine ...

example.name: just arg0
example.text: the sound of her voice, the light of her face, the touch of her hand, had a strong beneficial influence with him

roleset.name: cause an effect by touching
roleset.note: TOUCH-V NOTES: This sense is probably very very rare. (from touch.07-v)
TOUCHING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from touching.07-n)

example.name: certainly unusual reading
example.text: [*-1] Reaching for an old clay pot , relic of pioneer days , [he]-1 tore the envelope in pieces , [*-1] dropping them into it , [*-1] touching the little pyre to flame , watching it curl , the red sealing wax melting and bubbling in the feathery ash .

roleset.name: touch off: start
roleset.note: TOUCH_OFF-V NOTES: Cf. 'start' or 'begin' for additional examples. (from touch.02-v)
TOUCHING_OFF-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from touching.02-n)

example.name: the only example in subcorpus
example.text: Nor do analysts expect the Sansui deal to touch off a fresh wave of foreign purchases.
example.arg: a fresh wave of foreign purchases

roleset.name: touch off: ignite
roleset.note: TOUCH_OFF-V NOTES: (from touch.06-v)
TOUCHING_OFF-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from touching.06-n)

example.name: automatically generated
example.text: [A sizable supply of powder]-1 had been touched [*-1]off .

roleset.name: touch up: repair, to repair
roleset.note: TOUCH_UP-V NOTES: (from touch.03-v)
TOUCH_UP-N NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01. Comparison to verb entry touch.03 (touch_up). No VN, FN. (from touch.02-n)
TOUCHING_UP-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from touching.03-n)

example.name: Args 0 and 1
example.text: ?I think the reason we win is we have all of those details,? she said, deftly wielding an airbrush to finish her touch-up of the base.

roleset.name: touch on: be/get involved with
roleset.note: TOUCH_ON-V NOTES: VN updated by Julia. Member of Vncls relate-86.2-1. (from touch.04-v)
TOUCHING_ON-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from touching.04-n)

example.name: don't touch me there!
example.text: The interview did not touch on Singapore's domestic affairs.

roleset.name: touch upon: same as touch on
roleset.note: TOUCH_UPON-V NOTES: (from touch.05-v)
TOUCHING_UPON-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from touching.05-n)

example.name: silly English particles
example.text: And so I would only touch upon it now ( much as I have long wanted [*-1] to write a book about it ) .
example.arg: much as I have long wanted [*-1] to write a book about it

roleset.name: establish communication with someone abt smth
roleset.note: TOUCH_BASE-V NOTES: (from touch.08-v)
TOUCHING_BASE-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from touching.08-n)

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: Peter just got back to me a min ago and said get the bottom one , can you touch base with him ASAP before I purchase it ?

roleset.name: in need of careful handling
roleset.note: TOUCHY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. (from touchy.01-j)

role.descr: stimulus, what arg1 is touchy about

example.name: arg1
example.text: He states that it is quite touchy , almost painful with walking .

example.name: both args
example.text: I could tell she was touchy about certain subjects with the way she spoke and her body language

roleset.name: handsy, unable to resist
roleset.note: TOUCHY-J NOTES: Added by Julia. Relation to touch.01. (from touchy.02-j)

role.descr: entity who wont' stop touching things

example.name: arg0
example.text: At this she was a bit annoyed, he was too touchy and she didn't like the way it felt a bit possessive.
